source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: REMOTE Workshop Facilitation Masterclass
items.headline: Plan and Execute REMOTE Workshops & Meetings with your REMOTE Teams - become the Time Management and Facilitation PRO!
objectives_summary: How to manage a remote online meeting or a workshop - how many attendees you should have and how much time will be needed to achieve the outcome
How to facilitate the workshop remotely
How to Manage your time appropriately so that you can get to the desired outcome with NO Follow Up meetings

items.title: Driving Corporate Strategy

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course explores strategic management tools and techniques.
objectives_summary: Discover how to establish a strategic management process at your organization.
Recognize how to facilitate the development and implementation of strategy at your organization.
Identify how to play an important leadership role in strategic planning and management of your organization.

items.title: How to unlock your team's potential
items.headline: Learning how to improve the performance of your team
objectives_summary: How to improve the performance of your team.
Helping leaders improve the results of their teams by unlocking their potential.
GROW model coaching framework.

items.title: Improving Team Engagement Program for Managers

visible_instructors.title: Mandy Curry
visible_instructors.name: Mandy
visible_instructors.job_title: Co-Founder at Business Uplifted, Healthy Kids Inc.

items.headline: Aligning the way you and your team work so that productivity and engagement flow easily within your team.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, students will have learned what keeps teams and workplaces out of alignment and the action plan they can put into place immediately to create teams that are engaged and inspired.

items.title: The Complete Sports Facility Manager's Guide
items.headline: Sports Facility Management Certificate Program of Hand Picked Chapters from MBA in Sports Management by Master Faculty
objectives_summary: 11 Core Competences, CEN Definition, BS Stander and its Purpose, Benefits According to BS Standards, ISO Standards, Value Index.
What is Facility Manager and Management its Disciplines, Functions, Organisation Flow Chart, Responsibilities,
Staffing, Classification, Organisation Chart, Preparing Job Description, Hiring Procedures, Announcements, Interview.

items.title: Negotiations for Small Business Owners
items.headline: Tactics, Methods, Do's, and Don'ts for Negotiating as a Small Business Owner
objectives_summary: You’ll learn how to create a game plan that will make you more successful in every negotiation.
You’ll learn how to prioritize what you should negotiate.
You’ll learn how to spot the arbitrage opportunities in a deal.

items.title: Change Management
items.headline: Learn the skills to deliver a successful change process
objectives_summary: Deliver an effective change programme
Understand the key differences between change management and other related skills
Improve the way you address the human element of your change programme

items.title: AGILE & SCRUM FUNDAMENTALS  A to Z:   FROM ZERO TO MASTERY

visible_instructors.title: Srikanth Rao
visible_instructors.name: Srikanth
visible_instructors.job_title: Project Manager with 17 yrs  exp in Fortune 100 companies

items.headline: Become an Agile expert in just 4 hours
objectives_summary: Everything you need to know about Agile and Scrum - From Zero to Expertise Level by the end of the course.
Agile Manifesto and Principles Explained. Exploration of Agile Frameworks.
How to inculcate the Agile Mindset and bring it to your work.

items.title: Consulting Method of Problem Solving. In 2 hours!

visible_instructors.title: Adham Abdelfattah
visible_instructors.name: Adham
visible_instructors.job_title: Alum: Manager @McKinsey, Head of PM @Amazon, Startup Founder

items.headline: A crash course in problem solving like a top tier management consultant. Accelerate your career!
objectives_summary: How management consultants at the world's top firms work on solving problems
A 6-step methodology to break down any business problem into solvable pieces without being an expert
How projects are structured for effective execution

items.title: How to Become a Manager
items.headline: Steps You Need to Take to Become a Manager
objectives_summary: You will be able to assess where you stand in the workforce.
You will learn what it takes to become a manager.
You will be able to put an action plan together of what next steps to take.

items.title: Comprehensive Guide to the Soccer Business World
items.headline: Taking you behind the scenes of the beautiful game
objectives_summary: Learn about the historical development of soccer and its societal significance
Get familiar with various aspects that make up the soccer product
Understand the different types of the soccer product consumers

visible_instructors.name: Rama Krishna

items.headline: A Practical Approach
objectives_summary: How to gather HR data from employees
How to create database in Excel
How to create different data entry forms in Excel

items.title: Successful Leadership Skills in the Information Age
items.headline: Leading teams of people is a skills that has changed in the Information Age & Globalisation. Learn effective techniques
objectives_summary: How to lead a group
What area's of leadership are the most effective
What personality type & traits you require to lead

items.title: PMP® Project Management Professional - Exam prep
items.headline: Learn from the best! Incl. 87 PDU's, 200+ Questions and comprehensive study guides...
objectives_summary: Manage any project

items.title: 7 Advanced Quality Tools (Management & Planning Tools)

visible_instructors.job_title: B.E.Mech, ASQ-Certified Six Sigma Black Belt, MBA Operations

items.headline: A complete course of tools and techniques used to help effectively plan and manage various types of business operations
objectives_summary: Effectively plan and manage various types of business operations
These tools are intended to guide students in the planning, analysis, and decision making processes
7 Management and Planning Tools

items.title: Master Decision Making Best Practices of Fortune 500 Firms

visible_instructors.title: Dr. Gleb Tsipursky, PhD
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Gleb
visible_instructors.job_title: Globally-Renowned Behavioral Science Trainer for Fortune 500

items.headline: Master all decision making practices (quick, major, and strategic) of Fortune 500 firms taught by world-renowned expert
objectives_summary: Master best practices for all decision-making scenarios (quick, major, complex, and strategic) used by Fortune 500 firms to seize competitive advantage
Feel truly confident about whether you made the right call in your quick, major, complex, and strategic decisions
Free yourself of constant ruminations, numerous grey zones, and mental blindspots that plague typical decision making
